benefit: The industry standard for web analytics and user behavior tracking.
description: Google Analytics is a powerful web analytics service that tracks and reports website traffic, currently as a platform inside the Google Marketing Platform brand. It provides invaluable insights into how users find and interact with your site.

benefit: Visualize user behavior with heatmaps, session recordings, and surveys.
description: Hotjar is an all-in-one analytics and feedback tool that helps you understand your users' behavior and get their feedback through tools like heatmaps, session recordings, and surveys.

benefit: Develop, Preview, and Ship with the best developer experience.
description: Vercel is a platform for frontend frameworks and static sites, built to integrate with your headless content, commerce, or database. It makes development and deployment incredibly fast and easy.
seoMetaDescription: Deploy your Next.js app with Vercel for the best performance and developer experience.

benefit: Engage your audience with powerful email marketing and automation.
description: Mailchimp is an all-in-one marketing platform for small businesses. They empower millions of customers around the world to start and grow their businesses with world-class marketing technology, award-winning support, and inspiring content.

benefit: Plan and schedule your social media content across multiple platforms.
description: Buffer is a social media management platform for businesses and individuals to manage their social media presence. It allows users to schedule posts to various social media platforms.

benefit: All-in-one marketing toolkit for digital marketing professionals.
description: SEMrush is a popular and powerful all-in-one digital marketing suite of tools. This SEO software helps you with keyword research, competitor analysis, backlink analysis, site audits, and much more.
